DIA_Gabrien_Hello_03_01: I'm making sure none of you ever thinks of snooping around our stuff!
DIA_Gabrien_lesson_15_00: Something tells me you must have been skipping manners class.
DIA_Gabrien_lesson_03_01: That's a good one! Anything else you want to tell me?
DIA_Gabrien_lesson_15_02: I just don't understand why you treat us this way.
DIA_Gabrien_lesson_15_04: I'd like to know what this is all about.
DIA_Gabrien_lesson_03_05: Okay. I'll tell you why we don't like strangers like you.
DIA_Gabrien_lesson_03_06: You think if you get your ass kicked by orcs, you can do whatever you want?
DIA_Gabrien_lesson_03_07: You're taking our supplies, you're taking our food, and who knows, you might start taking our women from us too!
DIA_Gabrien_lesson_03_08: You've already begun to take our lives. The poor man died because of you, I'm sure of it!
DIA_Gabrien_lesson_03_10: What do you mean, who? Hendrik!
DIA_Gabrien_lesson_idontknow_03_12: He was a good guy, honest and fair.
DIA_Gabrien_lesson_idontknow_03_13: He was the best sentry in the village, but one of you slaughtered him like a molerat!
DIA_Gabrien_lesson_death_15_14: We had nothing to do with his death.
DIA_Gabrien_lesson_death_03_15: Beliar only knows! I do not and will not trust any of you!
DIA_Gabrien_lesson_death_03_16: And now go away, I have work to do.
DIA_Gabrien_building_03_01: Warehouse. Don't even think about trying to steal anything, or you'll regret it.
DIA_Gabrien_yourwork_15_00: What does your job look like?
DIA_Gabrien_yourwork_03_01: And what might it look like? I sit and watch the warehouse.
DIA_Gabrien_yourwork_03_02: Sometimes someone needs to be straightened out or a sheep needs to be herded back into the field.
DIA_Gabrien_yourwork_15_03: It must be a very responsible job.
DIA_Gabrien_yourwork_03_04: That's why I was entrusted with this task!
DIA_Gabrien_Ambient_03_00: What's your interest in this? Leave me alone!
DIA_Gabrien_Ambient_03_01: I got my shoes soaked from this damn weather...
DIA_Gabrien_Ambient_03_02: Just don't try anything stupid! I'm watching you closely...
DIA_Gabrien_WhereIsJorn_Kurt_15_01: Have you heard anything about Kurt's break-in?
DIA_Gabrien_WhereIsJorn_Kurt_03_02: Breaking into Kurt's? First I've heard of it, but I wouldn't be surprised if one of you strangers was behind it.
DIA_Gabrien_WhereIsJorn_Kurt_03_03: Ever since you got here, you think you're entitled to everything.
DIA_Gabrien_WhereIsJorn_Kurt_03_04: Get to work, like decent people!
DIA_Gabrien_WhereIsJorn_Jorn_15_01: Have you seen a bald, muscular guy anywhere?
DIA_Gabrien_WhereIsJorn_Jorn_15_03: Yeah, that's my brother. He's missing and I'm looking for anyone who knows anything about him.
DIA_Gabrien_WhereIsJorn_Jorn_03_04: Missing? Nothing and nobody goes missing in this village.
DIA_Gabrien_WhereIsJorn_Jorn_03_05: Knowing you strangers, he's probably slipped in where he shouldn't have slipped in and stealing supplies from honest people!
